channel.title: Server's IP?
channel.description:
I really need help, I been working on my server, went to put it online, and only I could access it. I asked my friend to try it he said it didn't work. I think its a problem in my IP address for the server. Do I use my computer IP or internet IP?
I have a ton of routing in my house, very confusing. I get my internet by the main wireless router in my basement, sends a signal to another wireless router in my dad's office where its connected to another wireless thing into my wireless bridge...very confusing, might make everything harder for me...
Its weird because when I have my server running, only I can get on using my computer IP, 127.0.0.1, and putting no ip at all...
anyone know my problem?

item.title: Server's IP?
item.dc:creator: @icescape icescape
item.description:
@icescape wrote:

I really need help, I been working on my server, went to put it online, and only I could access it. I asked my friend to try it he said it didn’t work. I think its a problem in my IP address for the server. Do I use my computer IP or internet IP?

I have a ton of routing in my house, very confusing. I get my internet by the main wireless router in my basement, sends a signal to another wireless router in my dad’s office where its connected to another wireless thing into my wireless bridge…very confusing, might make everything harder for me…

Its weird because when I have my server running, only I can get on using my computer IP, 127.0.0.1, and putting no ip at all…

anyone know my problem?
